GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 2404897 | website = | footnotes = | named_for = James Lawrence | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = }} Lawrenceville is a city in Gwinnett County, Georgia, in the United States. It is the county seat of Gwinnett County and is the second oldest city in the Atlanta metropolitan area. According to the 2020 census, 30,629 people lived there. ==References== Category:Gwinnett County, Georgia Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:County seats in Georgia
